subject: Tour de France (Bicycle Race)
Doping (Sports)
Bicycles and Bicycling
lead_paragraph: The seven Tour de France titles stripped from Lance Armstrong will not be awarded to other riders, and Armstrong and his teammates should return their prize money, the sport’s governing body said.
snippet: The seven Tour de France titles stripped from Lance Armstrong will not be awarded to other riders, and Armstrong and his teammates should return their prize money, the sport’s governing body said.
